resources.string: Hi, I am Ayush Dhiman from Himachal Pradesh, pursuing B.Tech from Rayat Bahra University,Mohali and currently in 7th semester.\n\nI am 21 years old and learning to build my own android applications and this Bio application is my one of the project.In this application i just created a image view,textview inside a linear layout.To build my own application I make use of java programming.
